text: Approval for the diomed 630 pdt laser, model t2usa.  This device is indicated for use in photodynamic therapy with photofrin (porfimer sodium) as a source of activation of photofrin for: a) palliation of patients with completely obstructing esophageal cancer, or of patients with partially obstructing esophageal cancer who, in the opinion of their physician, cannot be satisfactorily treated with nd: yag laser therapy.
